data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=P44RFZl0B9MQ7kNvgHOMgv0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDi5GLAjD5HKVSwdMPwo2UXbqtT5YP_KqAzojb35UXDZg&oe=66A0E3B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DfkT3jX_UAgQ7kNvgGN0nJ2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCC4_srNEpsvw8zUSZKjtdx6uwySx6H0HrKp8HjFx6Ykw&oe=66A0F152)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PtYpM07eaJ0Q7kNvgEK8UPD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBx7rzbVMi_eTWstkz_TsiuWmDUPLh883Vm9Gw2XjfohQ&oe=66A0DC89)
